testsuite.name: Typed Auth Kafka Client Tests

testcase.name: Handle response - ignores unknown correlation ID
Send request - handles Kafka send failure
Handle response - completes exceptionally for type mismatch
Handle response - completes future for matching correlation ID

testsuite.system-out: 04:17:00.472 [ForkJoinPool-1-worker-1] WARN com.connection.device.kafka.TypedAuthKafkaClient -- Received response for unknown correlationId: unknown-correlation-id 04:17:00.891 [ForkJoinPool-1-worker-1] WARN com.connection.device.kafka.TypedAuthKafkaClient -- Request timeout or error for correlationId: 373bc4ca-36a1-4d89-a41e-e378ffecf8df 04:17:00.891 [ForkJoinPool-1-worker-1] ERROR com.connection.device.kafka.TypedAuthKafkaClient -- Failed to send command: Kafka error 04:17:00.896 [ForkJoinPool-1-worker-1] INFO com.connection.device.kafka.TypedAuthKafkaClient -- Command sent successfully: correlationId=7cf80756-6aae-4ad7-bbf7-3d6bbf0cfbe6, topic=auth.commands 04:17:00.898 [ForkJoinPool-1-worker-1] WARN com.connection.device.kafka.TypedAuthKafkaClient -- Type mismatch for correlationId: 7cf80756-6aae-4ad7-bbf7-3d6bbf0cfbe6.
